title: sorting issue
description:
Hi,

I'm using apache solr search. i'm having problem in sorting by field value.

i.e suppose we have a field named 'function_area' and value may be 1,2,3,4

but i want that  function_area=2 should come on top and next record should come in ascending order.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise this kind of issue on the user's list first, we try to keep the JIRAs for known problems in the code rather than usage questions.

If you can suggest and/or provide code that implements your desired behavior, feel free to open an issue.
